EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Questions from Sally
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up from VisiCAD 5.2 Regional Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Follow Up from VisiCAD 5.2 Regional Training Answers to Your Questions Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Client}},
I wanted to take this opportunity to personally thank you for attending the VisiCAD 5.2 Training Seminar. To facilitate further knowledge sharing, we thought it might be valuable to share the questions and answers from the various regional training sessions held in 2012. Click here <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Questions compiled from 2012 VisiCAD 5.pdf> to download the questions and answers.
If you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact Technical Support at 800-VISICAD (800-847-4223).
Thanks,
Sally Olson-Nelson, Client Account Manager TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7358
